span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 有偿付能力的： able to pay all legal debts
【例】 They're going to have to prove that the company is now solvent. 接下来他们必须要证明公司的偿贷能力。
【反】 bankrupt 破产的

【考法 2】 n. 溶剂： a substance in which another substance is dissolved, forming a solution
【例】 Some organic solvents, such as benzene, pyridine, furan, are poisonous to human’s reproductive system.一些有机溶剂（比如苯、吡啶、呋喃）对人体的生殖系统有毒性。
【反】 solute 溶质

【记】 solve 能够解决这个问题的
